q: During a teleconference Monday, Simon Cowell suggested his former American Idol colleague Paula Abdul could be in the running for The X-Factor judging panel. "I'm a massive fan of Paula Abdul ," he said. We've been in regular contact. I'm not going to say today who we are going to confirm or not, because the truth is we haven't made up our minds up yet.... It comes down to who I think is interesting, and the commitment and the expertise each person offers. The panel for the show( which debuts next fall) won't be announced for several weeks. Simon Cowell also weighed in on allowing 12-year olds to audition even though some feel that is an early age to deal

They presumed the United States now could cut its military budget dramatically and spend that money at home. That perception was bolstered two years later when Colin Powell , then chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, declared: I'm running out of enemies. I'm down to Castro and Kim Il Sung . Colin Powell 's observation 20 years ago is still basically true: The United States has no militarily significant rivals, notwithstanding the terrorist threat and the war in Afghanistan.
